I'am sat here - and don't know want to say - reading some of your blogs you seem to blame your govt. for what happened on 9/11.

In the UK they have just sent 8 people to court for attempting to destroy (like 7 planes -  hence the liquid ban) they are just people who want to live their lives, bring up their kids and be HAPPY - if you what a WAR - stick on your uniform and fight like soldier - you believe in what you're doing - don't take the innocents - they don't know where you are coming from!!!!

9/11 conspiracies are a load of misinformation, inaccurate claims, and outright lies. Who do I believe? My government, who could easily be lying, but we can't prove it? Or some Joe Shmoe physicist-wannabe who makes up half of his "facts" to further spread conspiracy theories?

Neither, really.
